sections.heading: Repealed.Section 11-4-2 - Repealed
sections.text:
History:1953 Comp., § 4-30A-1, enacted by Laws 1975, ch. 102, § 1; repealed by Laws 1998, ch. 63, § 7.

Repeals.— Laws 1998, ch. 63, § 7, repealed 11-4-1 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1975, ch. 102, § 1, relating to the short title of the Housing Authority Act, effective July 1, 1998. For provisions of former section,seethe 1997 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com. For transfer of the functions of the housing authority to the New Mexico mortgage finance authority,see58-18-5.5 NMSA 1978.
